About Me üëã

I am Liuye Zhao, an undergraduate student majoring in Computer Science and Technology, Zhejiang University. I am now advised by Professor Xiaogang Jin.

My research focuses on image rendering (such as Gaussian blur, feathering; median filtering, mean filtering, etc.) to maintain high quality while maximizing rendering speed, achieving a balance between high quality and speed. This work has high value in various fields such as mobile rendering, film and television, and animation.

I am also interested in geometry processing for computer graphics and visual computing.

Email: masterforliage@gmail.com

Last updated: January 2026
